MetricDescription: Measures the time to produce the end products from the time input materials are released into the process at the initial startup of the process
Source: NIST: Key Performance Indicators for Process Control System Cybersecurity Performance Analysis

MetricDescription: Measures the amount of end products produced over a specific amount of time.
Source: NIST: Key Performance Indicators for Process Control System Cybersecurity Performance Analysis

MetricDescription: Measures the amount of input materials consumed over a specific amount of time
Source: NIST: Key Performance Indicators for Process Control System Cybersecurity Performance Analysis

MetricDescription: Output Yield Measures the percentage of the end product produced at the output of the process
Source: NIST: Key Performance Indicators for Process Control System Cybersecurity Performance Analysis

MetricDescription: Measures the availability of the critical equipment. The critical equipment in the Process Control System is the Reactor, Separator, and the Product Stripper
Source: NIST: Key Performance Indicators for Process Control System Cybersecurity Performance Analysis

MetricDescription: Measures the Reactor Pressure
Source: NIST: Key Performance Indicators for Process Control System Cybersecurity Performance Analysis

MetricDescription: Measures the Reactor Level
Source: NIST: Key Performance Indicators for Process Control System Cybersecurity Performance Analysis

MetricDescription: Measures the Reactor Temperature
Source: NIST: Key Performance Indicators for Process Control System Cybersecurity Performance Analysis

MetricDescription: Measures the Separator Level
Source: NIST: Key Performance Indicators for Process Control System Cybersecurity Performance Analysis

MetricDescription: Measures the Stripper Level
Source: NIST: Key Performance Indicators for Process Control System Cybersecurity Performance Analysis

MetricDescription: Measures the time when the production starts to the next unplanned stop in production
Source: NIST: Key Performance Indicators for Process Control System Cybersecurity Performance Analysis

MetricDescription: Measures the number of times the production stops unexpectedly, including emergency shutdown
Source: NIST: Key Performance Indicators for Process Control System Cybersecurity Performance Analysis

MetricDescription: Measures the percentage of time the planned production target is achieved over a specific amount of time.
Source: NIST: Key Performance Indicators for Process Control System Cybersecurity Performance Analysis

MetricDescription: Measures the percentage of production capacity utilized over a specific amount of time.
Source: NIST: Key Performance Indicators for Process Control System Cybersecurity Performance Analysis

MetricDescription: Measures the production cost of the end products
Source: NIST: Key Performance Indicators for Process Control System Cybersecurity Performance Analysis

MetricDescription: Measures the time delay along the path from transmitter to receiver
Source: NIST: Key Performance Indicators for Process Control System Cybersecurity Performance Analysis

MetricDescription: Delay Measures the difference between the packet path delay of two packets
Source: NIST: Key Performance Indicators for Process Control System Cybersecurity Performance Analysis

MetricDescription: Measures the amount of time for the source node to receive the acknowledgement of receipt (ACK) from the destination node
Source: NIST: Key Performance Indicators for Process Control System Cybersecurity Performance Analysis

MetricDescription: Measures the percentage of the quantity of process information packets over all packets transmitted
Source: NIST: Key Performance Indicators for Process Control System Cybersecurity Performance Analysis

MetricDescription: Measures the rate of bits transmitted or received over a specific amount of time
Source: NIST: Key Performance Indicators for Process Control System Cybersecurity Performance Analysis

MetricDescription: Measures the rate of packets transmitted and received over a specific amount of time
Source: NIST: Key Performance Indicators for Process Control System Cybersecurity Performance Analysis

MetricDescription: Measures the rate of packets received with errors over a specific amount of time
Source: NIST: Key Performance Indicators for Process Control System Cybersecurity Performance Analysis

MetricDescription: Measures the percentage of a unique packet protocol type observed over a specific amount of time
Source: NIST: Key Performance Indicators for Process Control System Cybersecurity Performance Analysis

MetricDescription: Measures the percentage of network capacity utilized over a specific amount of time
Source: NIST: Key Performance Indicators for Process Control System Cybersecurity Performance Analysis

MetricDescription: Measures the number of bytes contained in a packet
Source: NIST: Key Performance Indicators for Process Control System Cybersecurity Performance Analysis

MetricDescription: Measures the percentage of packets that failed to reach the destination node over a specific amount of time
Source: NIST: Key Performance Indicators for Process Control System Cybersecurity Performance Analysis

MetricDescription: Measures the percentage of central processing unit (CPU) utilized over a specific amount of time
Source: NIST: Key Performance Indicators for Process Control System Cybersecurity Performance Analysis

MetricDescription: Measures the percentage of memory utilized over a specific amount of time
Source: NIST: Key Performance Indicators for Process Control System Cybersecurity Performance Analysis

MetricDescription: Measures the mean rate and standard deviation of read and write operations to the server hard drive per software application
Source: NIST: Key Performance Indicators for Process Control System Cybersecurity Performance Analysis

MetricDescription: Measures the mean rate and standard deviation of packets transmitted and received per software application
Source: NIST: Key Performance Indicators for Process Control System Cybersecurity Performance Analysis

MetricDescription: Measures the percentage of network capacity utilized over a specific amount of time
Source: NIST: Key Performance Indicators for Process Control System Cybersecurity Performance Analysis

MetricDescription: Measures the percentage of the quantity of process information packets over all packets transmitted
Source: NIST: Key Performance Indicators for Process Control System Cybersecurity Performance Analysis

MetricDescription: Measures the time delay along the path from transmitter to receiver
Source: NIST: Key Performance Indicators for Process Control System Cybersecurity Performance Analysis

MetricDescription: Measures the rate of packets transmitted and received over a specific amount of time
Source: NIST: Key Performance Indicators for Process Control System Cybersecurity Performance Analysis

MetricDescription: Measures the number of application payload data in bytes in a packet
Source: NIST: Key Performance Indicators for Process Control System Cybersecurity Performance Analysis

MetricDescription: Measures the number of bytes contained in a packet
Source: NIST: Key Performance Indicators for Process Control System Cybersecurity Performance Analysis

MetricDescription: Measures the mean rate and standard deviation of packets transmitted and received on DeviceNet.
Source: NIST: Key Performance Indicators for Process Control System Cybersecurity Performance Analysis

MetricDescription: Measures the amount of time for the information to be available on the OPC server after the information is sent from the PLC
Source: NIST: Key Performance Indicators for Process Control System Cybersecurity Performance Analysis

MetricDescription: Measures the amount of time for the information to be available on the PLC after the information is sent from the OPC client
Source: NIST: Key Performance Indicators for Process Control System Cybersecurity Performance Analysis
